projects.title: VO2
projects.subtitle: 2022 Class of the Techstars Accelerator
projects.content: A blockchain-based platform that allows athletes to tokenize themselves and create fan-athlete economies.

projects.title: WordleMon
projects.subtitle: Gotta Guess 'Em All!
projects.content: A Wordle-like game that allows users to guess a daily randomly generated Pokemon.

projects.title: Dapper
projects.subtitle: NFT
projects.content: Meta-NFT handshake collectible based on Ethereum that provides iconic handshakes from the web available to mint.

projects.title: Stashed
projects.content: Manage your inventory of sneakers, apparel, and collectibles.
features: Real-time market value of inventory items
Manage other sources of income and expenses

projects.title: Elevate
projects.content: Created to assist with unsystematic virtual college classes.
features: Add and manage classes or import them directly from Canvas
Receive notifications for upcoming assignments or events
Track attendance and mark assignments as complete

projects.title: Monopoly
projects.content: Monopoly project for AP Computer Science.
features: Opens in a GUI window, complete with a board and moving pieces
External menus to interact with the game and other players
Play a full game of Monopoly with another player
